text: Infinite patience, infinite purity, and infinite perseverance are the secret of success in a good cause.
To succeed, you must have tremendous perseverance, tremendous will. 'I will drink the ocean', says the persevering soul.
Every work has got to pass through hundreds of difficulties before succeeding. Those that persevere will see the light, sooner or later.
It is the cheerful mind that is persevering. It is the strong mind that hews its way through a thousand difficulties.
Be like the lotus flower that grows in the mud but remains clean and fragrant.
You must be the change you wish to see in the world. Complaining changes nothing.
